alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 08 at 9:26PM EDT until October 09 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures around 28 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...In Maryland, Extreme Western Allegany County. In West Virginia, Western Mineral County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
